Tensei-Goblin-da-kedo-Shitsumon-aru.title: Tensei Goblin dakedo Shitsumon aru
Tensei-Goblin-da-kedo-Shitsumon-aru.author: Miki Nazuna
Tensei-Goblin-da-kedo-Shitsumon-aru.description: Office worker Akira Yagami's altruistic nature usually gets him the short end of the stick. When he dies after saving a kid from oncoming traffic... He reincarnates in another world as a goblin?! Normally, goblins only live for seven days, but Akira's newfound powers let him defy the species' normal life span...and are the key to his path to becoming the strongest goblin ever!

Kono-Sekai-ga-Izure-Horobu-Koto-wo-Ore-d.title: Kono Sekai ga Izure Horobu Koto wo Ore dake ga Shitte Iru
Kono-Sekai-ga-Izure-Horobu-Koto-wo-Ore-d.author: HAIJIMA Shigeru
Kono-Sekai-ga-Izure-Horobu-Koto-wo-Ore-d.description: 平凡なサラリーマン・一条明は会社からの帰り道、ミノタウロスに襲われ死んだ――次の瞬間、彼は会社で目を覚ました！明は死から復活し、レベルやステータスを引き継いで、特定の時間から人生をやり直すことができる固有スキル“黄泉帰り”を持っていたのだ!!異世界のモンスターが人々を襲い、破滅へと向かう残酷な現実世界で明はスキルを駆使して、幼なじみの七瀬奈緒と生き延びることを模索する――!!
